recipesJson.name: Cornish Cornet
recipesJson.author: Statch
recipesJson.description:
It wouldn't be summer without ice cream right? This one is just a simple Cornish vanilla ice cream, served in a wafer cone. I suppose you could add some ws-23 for some added authenticity, but I've never really been one for cold vapes.

This recipe also serves as a great base to add your favourite toppings. Got a favourite strawberry combo? Pop it in. Mint choc-chip anyone? Sure why not. Hope you all enjoy

reviews.text: I don’t get more than the just a bit of cone, and I do get a pretty noticeable maple note that seems like it shouldn't be there. But this is delicious. I love the super rich vanilla dairy cream here, it’s delightful.
